name: Unsupervised-individual-motion
body:
# unsupervised ,no label, one person ,1 whole day of accelerator ,speed
* 1)whether add spd when cluster by accelerator mod50->4 [mean std min max]
 4 cluster: add no speed when gmm cluster , run divided into 2 clusters,drive divide into 2class
            add twice speed when gmm cluster: driving seperated
            spd is a mess in each cluster
 2 cluster:walkrunride-活动   sitdrive-不活动
           add twice speed,ride and drive  are in one class
           add no speed only accelerator, walkriderun|drivesit could be seperated,20spd noise in walkrunride
            add one speed, ride
             只用acc聚类后  spd肯定有分错的   在walkriderun里面有 20spd  去噪工作 去掉无监督分错的，保留主要矛盾






* 2)add 1 spd or 4 spd ,adjust the weight of spd
* 3)how to identify each group ,run or ride walk? use speed_mean,speed_std,speed_max,speed_min, which is invariant between people



基于个人的unsupervise ,like running->athlete etc. assuming某个人大部分时间手机放一个位置 gmm+knn
ios motion 状态突变分界点判断


用同一个分类器walkride去判断不同人的walk ride不太准
基于每个人自己的accelerator 聚类 震动频率，每个类里面的速度有判断错的因为无监督，只按照特征自己聚类，速度去噪(中间值平滑)
然后每个类的速度的（速度不是因人而异） mean std min max
结果：如果哪天骑车多会聚类出骑车，哪天跑步了 但是跑不少 聚类不出来跑步
